translations.name: ENGKJ2 Translation
translations.description: Green's Literal Translation is a literal, formal equivalence translation of the Bible published in 1985.  The Masoretic Text is used as the Hebrew basis for the Old Testament, and the Textus Receptus is used as the Greek basis for the New Testament. Some also refer to it as the \\\"KJ2\\\" or \\\"KJV3\\\" due to its close association with the King James Version.
